RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 18400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE APRIL 29, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since March 29, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BEAT THE DEALER perfect position to turn, swept around leaders with a deft move, cleared in the stretch run and was all out to hold on at the wire. JUST TAPIT IN had an awkward start, raced back to the stretch with a late run in the final furlong but just missed in a good effort. STREAKY dueled early on, stayed game throughout between horses late. THE PINK Z dueled from inside to the turn, used up on rail, faded in stretch. HEIDI'S SINATRA never in the mix throughout. JUST TAPIT IN WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM SECOND AND PLACED LAST FOR A VIOLATION OF THE HISA WHIP RULE FROM THE GATE.

ENTRY.NAME: The Pink Z
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled from inside to the turn, used up on rail, faded in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Just Tapit In
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start, raced back to the stretch with a late run, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Streaky
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early on, stayed game throughout between horses late

ENTRY.NAME: Heidi's Sinatra
ENTRY.OWNER: Eyerman, Lee J. and Molumby, John
ENTRY.COMMENT: never in the mix throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Beat the Dealer
ENTRY.COMMENT: perfect position to turn, swept around leaders, cleared, held on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LADY LIVERMORE settled back to the turn, split horses into the stretch, rallied outside in the final furlong and cleared in good fashion while ridden out. SOULSTONE sharp break, chased leader to the stretch, gained while outfinished. HER TIME IS NOW inside speed to lead, stayed on to deep stretch, faltered late. STELLAR LEGACY broke a bit tardy, raced a wide while evenly in the stretch run. AUGURI saved ground throughout to no avail. TIZ BIZ through early, dropped far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Her Time Is Now
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to lead, stayed on to deep stretch, faltered late

ENTRY.NAME: Auguri
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout to no avail

ENTRY.NAME: Tiz Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early, dropped far back

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Livermore
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back to the turn, split horses, rallied outside, cleared

ENTRY.NAME: Stellar Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke a bit tardy, raced a wide while evenly in the stretch run

ENTRY.NAME: Soulstone
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp break, chased leader to stretch, gained while outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since March 29, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferre d).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ZERO TO ONEHUNDRED tracking leader to far turn, hooked in the turn, loped past late. BRONX good speed, battled off rail far turn stayed game in the lane. Z U AT THE RACES raced evenly while four wide into the far turn with no late punch. ELI close up to the half from inside, bid into the turn in tight even. ENGLISH CLASSIC never menaced throughout. KICK IT CHARLIE never a menace.

ENTRY.COMMENT: good speed, battled off rail far turn stayed game in the lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE SEPTEMBER 29, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since March 29, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Rac e Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIGHTVILLE quick to the front, well rationed throughout while ridden out in impressive fasion. HIGH POWERED tried to stay with leader to no avail, settled for second best. KING'S MISCHIEF chased top pair throughout with no late kick in the final furlong. TORNADO BOY raced inside on backstretch while well back with no late kick. BIG FRANK never in contention throughout. SUBDUED good position to the half with nothing left and faded back.

ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to stay with leader to no avail, settled for second best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 78. Allowance Purse 18400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 29, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Pref erred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GABE just off leader to turn, roused and cleared with energenic urging through the final furlong to the wire in a solid effort. BLUE NORTHER inside run to the turn, blocked into the stretch while no match. MY GRASS IS BLUE speed to the front from inside, battled to the stretch weakened. OVER CALENDARED off rail trip throughout with a bid in the stretch, flattened out. SUPER BROTHER never menaced and dropped back in the stretch run. OXWOOD tried to keep up early on, faded back steadily from the turn. WEAPON never a factor.

ENTRY.COMMENT: speed to the front from inside, battled to the stretch weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Super Brother
ENTRY.COMMENT: never menaced and dropped back in the stretch run

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 29, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAST ROO quick between horses to duel, roused sharply stretch run, clear. BAYOU SHACK between horses to turn, rallied three wide, led stretch outkicked. KOBE BEACH unhurred to quarter pole, rallied in the stretch for show spot. GOLDEN SURVIVOR three wide pace to the turn and weakened in the late going. REVERE NOTE raced along evenly with nothing left in the drive. READY TO SHAKE never factored. CONGRATS FOR GLORY saved ground throughout to no avail.

Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since March 29 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUBINSTEIN battled for the lead, dueled to the half and cleared off and held sway to the wire. WHISKEY ROAN dueled with winner to the half but could not keep up, bested rest. FATHER PATRICK raced along evenly throughout while settlinh for show spot. MONKEY ZONE always back while floating out past the quarter pole while no menace. TOP HAT BLITZ good position to the half with no late kick when needed.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 75. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred)(Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OBRIGADA just off leaders to turn, took over in hand to go clear in the stretch, felt the whip several times but was eased up in the final sixteenth as much the best. MEET IN SECRET good position throughout with a nice trip while no match for winner while best of the rest. LOVE MY CANDY had a troubled start, never far back throughout with an even trip for the show spot. IT FACTOR inside speed to the front, hounded to turn but gave in stretch. THIS IS ANFIELD tried to keep up, could not go on and faded back from the turn. SWEET TORI PAT had an awkward start and never threatened throughout. RUNAWAY WILLIE broke awkwardly from the gate and never menaced thereafter.

ENTRY.NAME: It Factor
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front, hounded to turn but gave in stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Love My Candy
ENTRY.COMMENT: troubled start, never far back throughout with a even trip

ENTRY.NAME: Obrigada
ENTRY.OWNER: GenStar Thoroughbreds and Hidden Brook Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off leaders to turn, took over in hand, wrapped up late

ENTRY.NAME: This Is Anfield
ENTRY.COMMENT: tried to keep up, could not go on and faded back from the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Tori Pat
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward start and never threatened throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Meet in Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: good position throughout with a nice trip, no match for winner

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke awkwardly from the gate and never menaced thereafter
